00008 // Inherit from this to get threading.  The usage is:
00009 //     threaded.start()
00010 //     threaded.join()
00011 // Implement the run() function as the thread.
00012 class Threaded {
00013     public:
00014         Threaded() : stopRequested(false), runThread() {}
00015         virtual void start() {
00016             assert(!runThread);
00017             runThread = boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread>
00018                 (new boost::thread
00019                  (boost::bind(&Threaded::run, this)));
00020         }
00021         virtual void stop() {
00022             assert(runThread);
00023             stopRequested = true;
00024             runThread->join();
00025         }
00026         void join() { 
00027             runThread->join(); 
00028         }
00029     protected:
00030         volatile bool stopRequested;
00031     private:
00032         virtual void run() = 0;
